text: Eduardo Alonso Nájera Pérez (born July 11, 1976) is a Mexican basketball player that currently plays for the Charlotte Bobcats of the NBA. He also played for the Dallas Mavericks for five seasons, the Golden State Warriors for one season, the Denver Nuggets for 4 seasons and the New Jersey Nets for two seasons. He went to University of Oklahoma for college. ==Other websites== *Eduardo Nájera's NBA profile Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Charlotte Bobcats players Category:Dallas Mavericks players Category:Denver Nuggets players Category:Golden State Warriors players Category:Mexican basketball players Category:New Jersey Nets players Category:People from Chihuahua (state) Category:Small forwards
title: Eduardo Nájera
